thread.title: Michael Meyers
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Michael Meyers

author: Michael Meyers
title: Michael Meyers
text: Wait five minutes and read this - DO NOT USE SERVICING STOP AT ALL!!! Sent my car in and continually returned in a worse condition! In fact they wont even speak to me now! Absolute sharks, liars, deceitful - not disimilar to the reputation of this industry as a whole. Do yourself a favour and avoid at all costs!
